metadata.title: Overview | Locations | University of South Florida

chunks.content:
USF is situated in the vibrant and diverse Tampa Bay region, with campuses in Tampa, St. Petersburg and Sarasota-Manatee. Together our campuses comprise more than 1,600 acres and nearly 12 million square
               feet of building space, with areas boasting coastal, bayfront and riverfront views.
